cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)
mng: texture, grain (of wood), inner essence, intrinsic order, reason, logic, truth, science, natural science (esp. physics), to manage, to pay attention to, to run (affairs), to handle, to put in order, to tidy up

exm.mng: texture, grain (of wood), inner essence, intrinsic order, reason, logic, truth, science, natural science (esp. physics), to manage, to pay attention to, to run (affairs), to handle, to put in order, to tidy up
to supervise, to manage, to administer, management, administration
to handle, to treat, to deal with, to process, to deal with a criminal case, to mete out punishment, to offer for sale at a reduced price, to punish
to comprehend, to understand, comprehension, understanding
to arrange, to tidy up, to sort out, to straighten out, to list systematically, to collate (data, files), to pack (luggage)
an ideal, a dream, ideal, perfect
to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position, to act as an agent or proxy, surrogate
theory, to argue, to take notice of
